alert.note: Alert for Ballard; Carlisle; Fulton; Hickman (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 18 at 11:57AM EDT until March 20 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Cairo .Minor flooding continues on the Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam and at Cairo. Water levels are flooding at both locations, and the river is forecast to fall below flood stage at both points late on Saturday. For the Ohio River...including Olmsted Lock and Dam, Cairo...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Cairo. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 40.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly agricultural bottomland and low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 41.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow evening and continue falling to 31.3 feet Monday, March 28. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
